entries.title: Gardening Pattern Language?
entries.body:
I've been reading a lot about [pattern languages](http://www.patternlanguage.com/), I was thinking we might want to start building one of these together as a community for our gardens?

Last week at the community bonfire we ended up talking so well about how we wanted to manage our space, the different things we thought were important. This looks like an amazing way to get that stuff down so we can talk about it.

Let me know what you think, I might just set up a wiki page anyway
